mapper.sql: id, version, code, menuName, imagePath, url, parentCode, leval, createTime
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT bu.id bid, bm.id, bu.loginName, bm.menuName, bm.imagePath, bm.leval, bm.code, bm.parentCode, bm.url FROM base_user_role bur INNER JOIN base_user bu ON bur.userId = bu.id INNER JOIN base_role_menu brm ON bur.roleId = brm.role_id INNER JOIN base_menu bm ON brm.menu_id = bm.id WHERE bu.loginName = #{loginName} AND bm.leval = #{leval} AND bm.parentCode=#{code}
SELECT DISTINCT bm.id, bm.menuName, bm.imagePath, bm.leval, bm.code, bm.parentCode, bm.url FROM base_menu bm WHERE bm.leval = #{leval} AND bm.parentCode=#{code}
